section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The IVSC is the global standard setter for valuation practice and the valuation profession. Acting in the public interest, it aims to develop, maintain and promote high quality, globally recognised standards including both the International Valuation Standards and the International Professional Standards.
relevant_communication: The IVSC publishes International Valuation Standards - a copy of which is available on the website. IVSC frequently publishes an ENews advising on its activities.
